name: BallPlay Cupid
description:
The object of the game is easy.

Guide balls through the puzzle to complete the set mission.
All you got for that are a few tools in a limited supply. A minimum of balls has to "survive" in order to make the puzzle count as "solved".

The game is easy to learn, but the puzzles may still be hard to solve. And many puzzles have multiple ways to solve them. Here comes the challenge. BallPlay Cupid offers a very expanded leaderboard system which allows you to compare your efforts with the rest of the world. Can you do it with less tools than somebody else? Can you do it in less time than somebody else?

The game is playable in both English and Dutch, and has been licensed under a GPL license so it's completely free.

Have fun with it.
